comments.body: or maybe pink
I feel like for this biome and maybe others just having patches of coarse or rooted dirt can go a long way to adding a sense of self and making each biome feel different.
I think it would be nice if was more brighter colored grass.

i was thinking about a slightly red-ish color tbh or maybe even another dirt type that pink trees are pretty cool but it looks kinda boring because there is no grass and ambient change it just look like the plains biome
I agree. Something like the taiga biome but darker, to compliment the dark bark of the trees

Estaría muy bien que los osos polares u orcas los atacaran. Que pusieran huevos con un mecanismo similar a las tortugas pero sobre hielo compacto/azul. 

Podrían pescar truchas (peces del frío), vivir en grupos numerosos en vez de solitarios como otros mobs.

En cuanto al mecanismo del mob sería sencillo: un mob que anda lento en la superficie y que nada muy rápido en el mar. Al morir se podría aprovechar la carne para enamorar a los osos polares, o incluso los huevos o que suelten aceite para realizar nuevos objetos.
Beste Idee
Si, Si
¿Cuál sería una característica que agregarían los pingüinos además de ser estéticamente agradable

Google Translation:
"Adding penguins would be perfect, because they added camels (desert) and the penguins would be their counterpart"

I agree, I think penguins would be super fun to see as a counterpart lol
I would like to see all wood variants have bookshelves too.

I'm not a fan of the unique block variants/types for 1 block only. It seems like they've let another block variants fall to the wayside like cracked, mossy, tiled, chiseled for most blocks that introduced them from being included on blocks that exist with other variants that block already has.

The fact mosaic is only for bamboo also is upsetting.
Good idea, this can easily be done by the minecraft developers. But.. I actually don’t have any “But”’s for this feature. It’s actually something that has no downsides. Definitely should be added!
Mosaic Wood For The Other Wood Types Would Be Great
Hmmm could even add Spruce bookshelves or warped Item Frames
I would love to see more things have a different variant like, the chests having more than just one wood type, and the legs of the beds have more than just oak
I would love to see more things have a different variant like, the chests having more than just one wood type, and the legs of the beds have more than just oak
dont forget about Chests!
I agree! But more shards could come with it.

Instead of a villager spawning near a dig site, the pottery wheel could be itself a part of the ruins, another reward for the player that would allow them to restore this lost profession by moving the station to a village.
add it so they do drop berry's or drop the in game sweet berry's.

Cherry blossom trees don't actually have palatable cherries for humans, it would be from the smaller cherry trees species.

Also, why? It would need to have a unique purpose to be worth adding.
Additionally, I think a different fruit should be available depending on which tree you break. Say, Bananas for Jungle Trees, Pears for Dark Oak Trees, and I agree, Cherries for Cherry Trees.
Cherries will be great fruit in Minecraft but mojang please add more fruits like oranges and bananas
Good idea, I hope they join
New type of vines would be better here. For example vines with spines like on Rose's stem. But I support your idea.
Maybe the vines could be thicker than regular vines and they could also have a pink color that is similar to the color of the cherry leaves.
drop cherrys?
For some reason in the game it's oak (what?). I can suggest as an alternative to make the azalea a bush, in reality it is.
For wattles!
For wattles!

Maybe the azalea wood could be mint,and if it is a flowering wood,it would look the same but with azalea flowers,which could also spawn in the cherry blossom,which would mean that in all cherry blossoms,there would be a lush cave underground called a Sakura lush cave,which would make the lush cave look like a cherry blossom
I think the reason why there is no azalea wood in the first place is because the azalea trea is pretty rare to find, imagine searching for an azalea tree just for like 20 blocks of wood

The rarity of azalea wood is not an issue, as is it very easy to farm once found. It really should have its own wood type. Even if it is just a big bush; it's not an 'oak' bush. Personally, I'd like green, and since the stems of bushes tend to have greener wood, I think it makes sense. (But purple or white would be awesome too!)
green (cause moss) or grey (cuz caves) would also be great colours for azalea wood!
Totally agree. Right now the plants are only comestic and considering how hard is to get sniffers and how special they look, their plants should be important too
For how aesthetic the sniffer is, it’s not worth hunting down and should just spawn naturally fr fr
Exactly! It's a shame there are only 2 plants. Maybe a new kind of wood ? This way they could add "unnatural" colour that normally doesn't appear in overworld
It would be nice if mojang would add more flowers (at least 2-3 more), because 2 flowers is too few.
definitely need more use for the existing sniffer plants other than being aesthetic. using them for potion ingredients would be sick.
that would be nice in a Japanese update
seriously?
I think that would be a great idea! I don't agree with the "very cheap" part though.
I voted, cuz i had ramen, MILLIONS of times and it is my favourite food
I voted, cuz i had ramen, MILLIONS of times and it is my favourite food

This post is making me hungry ;( 

(voted!)
Good idea

T

hat is no brainer to not add
Com certeza essa é uma boa idéia. Acredito que uma das estruturas com menos importância para os jogadores hoje em dia sejam os templos da Selva, isso daria motivos para visita-lo.
Why did they not add this yet lmao
maybe it should emit the same light level as a soul torch?
Хочу чтобы этот цветок светился когда его поджигали огнивом или заряжаясь энергией солнца
stuff like it giving off light?

In my opinion, I think torch flowers shouldn't emit light. Instead, it should be able to disable mob spawning in 7 to 15 blocks radius as same as a torch. This way, players can express themselves more with their slabless, lightless, and natural builds. It could also add to the lore that people called it torchflower because of its similar hostile mob repelling capabilities as a torch.

My idea is to be able to light the torchflower with a fire as its a torch flower and for it to give off some sort of ambience a lot like how the spore blossom or the Fireflies would give off a glow and particles but for this fire to not be permanent it could simply last maybe 2 minecraft days but when it rains the flowers fire would go out. This could give a very low light level or could give a high one I thought it could be cool if it gave off a light level depending on durability and what it was lit by so lets say its lit by a lava source it will give a light level of 9 or 13 but if its given by a really weak durability flint n steel it would give off a light level of 1 or 2. I think it would be cool to give a torchflower more uses. Also I think since its ancient and it's rare to get it could be cool if it gave a function to get rid of sculk on the ground as it would slowly but surely push it out but let's say sculk tries to grow in whatever is in the torch flowers radius the sculk cant grow on.
As someone else suggested, the inverse would also be cool. Perhaps another flower that the Sniffers can find seeds for?
If you feed bee torchflower, honey gives 1 minute night vision effect
Elytra Armor Trims should work only on the Loom. Maybe it should use Banner Pattern instead of trims
let’s make sure they add copper trimmings on our elytra’s

Or add new durability, toughness and even protection plus extra knockback

For example Netherite has 1+ knockback resistance when trimed by diamond or Netherite then it would add 2+ Knockback Resistance and extra blast resistant of 15%

And other materials such iron and gold will gain more durability and toughness
This is a great idea, because adding customizability to the looks of your elytra would make an already great looking item look even better

Players should be able to add armor trims to their elytras to add armor points. The better the trim material is, the better the armor points are and the more durability the elytra has. To balance out the armor points, the better the material, the more the elytra would “weigh”. The elytra’s weight would make a player fall faster and/or use up more rockets.

We just need the armor trims to go on the elytra
And horse trim that would complete the armor trims at the moment it's an incomplete feature
Great idea
What about new unique trades to Nether and End villagers?

No me gustaria ese cambio dentro de los aldeanos, ya que para los jugadores tetnicos se nos complican los tradeos de aldeanos, como conseguir fortuna, sera complicado encontrar aquel bioma q nos brinde la posibilidad de obtenerlo, y para obtener irrompible, sera necesario cambiar de aldea...
Si se obtaran las posibilidades de encontrar dichas aldeas de una manera mas estrategica, fuera posible para mi implementar esta nueva funcion de tradeos, como por ejemplo nuevas señales para localizar una aldea cercana, o de un bioma buscado....
Espero su opinion...
i like that idea of custom enchants for the other dimensions. Like lava walker, or ender's grace (allows you to teleport where you're looking by pushing the "use button"
Definitely not

No, no, definitely not. Biome locking villagers is already bad enough and the way the durability system is currently would make complicated on top of complicated to have nether/end villagers have these. Additionally, villagers are not supposed to be multi-dimensional beings. This would maybe make for an interesting mod, but definitely not a main game feature.
Cre que estariaa muy bien para una version de detalles pero eso es cosa de moyang.ADIOS
Hi I would like custom elytras to be added to Minecraft and more armor please
buena idea
Add three wheat to go over the two cherries and 1 sugar for the cherry pie recipe.

I agree with that , since the cherry leaves are completely different from any other leaves in the game , it would make sense they would drop cherry ( a different food source and similar to apples ) we really don't like the idea of getting apples from a cherry blossom tree!
Besides, adding a item which is unique to this biom add another reason to explore around the the minecraft world . Perhaps this item could unlock some new recipes like golden cherrys and cherry pies ( like pumpkin pie ) , or maybe it's just a small food addition to the game ( similar to melons )
I think by adding cherrys, there would be some potentials to see with new potion recipes as well .
I think they should add a culture system like for shiny bai!
This would be really could
These aren't the right kind of cherry tree that can provide palatable fruit.
I think thats a great idea. They are already adding a way to move on land with 2 players with the camel, so I think that they could also do that.
Yha that would be cool or add like a Indian tribe that you would get them from
I think this would actually fit really well with the theme of the update! And it would encourage more players to go on adventures together

Yes, would be awesome, minecarts train could be fun for rollercoasters, long rails transportation and big base. As the canoe, new races, long distances etc... More ways to make long exploration's group!
This would make for a really cool minigame, and would be more accessible than installing mods or datapacks! I would have loved this as a kid, growing up on xbox360 minecraft with my siblings!

You can already connect minecarts together with a furnace minecart to make a train, but it can be finicky, isn't able to go up inclines, and is slow. I do believe that this system needs improvement, maybe using the chain item. As for canoes, it would be interesting if you could go faster depending on how many people were rowing, but as a whole, the feature seems hard to implement, especially given it would need a pretty large model.
the canoe idea, cool, but what we need much more is the minecart linking, not just for multiplayer, but also for being able to have a large convoy of items behind you as you travel by rail

hi you be friends

  • Anime art
Yes it will be amazing!!!
If not a ride for more people, perhaps a traveling "bed" that doesn't reset spawn point.

Les "graines sur des bâtons" pourraient être de différent types (fabriqués avec différentes graines) pour un pilotage plus complexe (certaines servant pour marcher d’autres pour nager, une autre pour sauter, pour charger (¿ une attaque potentielle ?) …) ce qui en ferais un mob plutôt fonctionnel
I don't think it'd work. Plus, camels are designed as a 2-player mount.
I don't even need to be able to control it, just let me slap a saddle on it and ride along with it for fun

Yes.

pls mincraft would be very cool and it would make me happy :)
Great idea, but they'd probably have to make the cherry blossom forests have an abundance of rivers since frogs are amphibians.
I think the poison dart frog might be cool as well.  Maybe in caves???
The elytra is already quite overpowered, but is slightly balanced by it replacing the chestplate. I don't think the player should be made much stronger before they add new and bigger dangers
No, it's balanced for players to have to choose flight or protection. Both would be OP. It's up to the player to know how to use them in situations.
Kinda op imo. Also they already made swapping quickly easier with the armor hotswap thing in the new snapshot so i see no real reason for this
the fact that elytra replaces chestplate is the balancing part. you're trading out major protection for flight
I would absolutely love this! This would make sorting items in my ender chest so much better!
I can’t think of any time you’d need enough inventory space to need to differentiate more than 17 shulker boxes
Yes please. We desperately need more ways to tell shulker boxes apart.
It would be super cool if the trims could have markings similar to those on the archeology pots just announced!

I don't think we should have *armour* trims on shulker boxes but I think it would be very cool if we could dye shulker shells and then combine them to make a shulker box with two differently coloured shells. This would mean that a total of 256 different shulker box combinations could be made so differentiating boxes would be much easier.

The dev team never push their ideas far enough. The addition of armor trims is great, but they should have added it to all kinds of items. Using a white Rib Trim on a red shulker box would be perfect for identifying my rockets with the red and white striped visual.
This would be amazing, especially if it would include the option to apply netherite for some lava protection.
yes absolutly this! armor trims or banner patterns! there are too many similarly colored items in the game to remember what's in what shulker box off color alone.
This would be super cool only if minecraft would actually listen to the community
Si
Si
if this gets 2k votes

Another cool feature orange could have…

Irl silverfishes hate the smell of orange and other citrus fruits.

Maybe this could be implemented to Minecraft aswell! Eating an orange / drinking an orange juice potion will give you an effect that makes silverfishes passive towards you for a few minutes.

And could also be used to turn an infested stone block into a regular one. Similar to how you can wax Copper using Honeycomb.
Woah this is a totally good idea!!!!!
this is a pretty cool idea. :)
You mean tortoises?
I think you mean tortoises lol

I would love this omg -- maybe, like frogs, there could be different variants. Maybe ones that look similar to snapping turtles in swamps, and maybe mossy in caves. It would be cool to find turtles with maybe seaweed on them near beaches, or vines in jungles, or maybe ones with flowers on them in cherry blossom groves.
They should be smaller and you can pick them up and put them in your inventory.
No, not the tiger
